price: ពួកទាំងនោះ(ពួកតាមស្ហៃតន)ទីជម្រករបស់ពួកគេ គឺ នរកជើហាន់ណាំ ហើយពួកគេគ្មានវិធីណាអាចគេចចេញពីវាបាន ឡើយ។
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَأۡوَىٰهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ عَنۡهَا مَحِيصٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: ulāika mawāhum jahannamu walā yajidūna ʿanhā maḥīṣan
